content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining and Storage Facility
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (40.0, -84.0) with a drop position at (40.5, -82.5)
- Wooden Chest at position (40.5, -82.5) containing coal
- Wooden Chest at position (41.5, -83.5) containing coal
- Burner Inserter at position (54.5, -83.5) with a pickup position at (53.5, -83.5) and a drop position at (55.5, -83.5)
- Wooden Chest at position (56.5, -83.5) containing iron plates
- Burner Inserter at position (41.5, -80.5) with a pickup position at (41.5, -79.5) and a drop position at (41.5, -81.5)

### Copper Plate Smelting Facility
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (-15.0, -49.0) with a warning of no ingredients to smelt

### Iron Plate Storage
Consists of the following entities:
- Iron Chest at position (0.5, 0.5) containing iron plates
- Iron Chest at position (1.5, 0.5) containing coal

### Lab Facility
Consists of the following entities:
- Lab at position (5.5, 5.5) with 10 automation science packs inserted, currently with no power

### Belt System
Consists of the following entities:
- BeltGroup with inputs and outputs connecting various positions, currently working with coal inventory

## ERROR TIPS

### Insufficient Materials for Crafting
- Ensure you have gathered all necessary materials before attempting to craft items such as automation science packs, labs, electronic circuits, and solar panels.

### Errors When Placing Entities Without Inventory
- Ensure the required entity is available in your inventory before attempting to place it on the map. For example, ensure you have a lab in your inventory before trying to place it.

### Errors When Finding Nearest Power Source
- Ensure that the power source, such as a steam engine, exists on the map before trying to find it. This will prevent errors related to missing entities.

### Errors Related to No Power
- Ensure that your lab and other power-dependent structures are connected to a power source to avoid operational interruptions.
